alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:55PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 345 PM MST... At 254 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Black Canyon City to near Camelback Ranch. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Youngtown, New River, Sun City West, Waddell, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Cave Creek, Carefree, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, North Mountain Park and Downtown Peoria. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 204 and 241. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 4 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 142 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
